welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Montague, a charming small town known for its scenic views and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Westover ARB
terminals.description: A military airport located in Chicopee, Massachusetts, serving the Westover Air Reserve Base.

terminals.name: Metropolitan Airport
terminals.description: A small public airport located in Chicopee, Massachusetts, serving the surrounding communities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dillant-Hopkins Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dillant-Hopkins Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
